EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PCF Virtual User Group Beta_2018.Approved Feb 27 Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmed: February 27 EMEA PCF User Group Registration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hooray!
We’re looking forward to seeing you on February 27, 2019. Please {{my.EMEAFeb27:default=edit me}} to add this meeting to your calendar.
Here are the WebEx details: https://pivotal.webex.com/pivotal/j.php?MTID=md223fb20a439cbae4994100f45574675 <[[https://pivotal.webex.com/pivotal/j.php?MTID=md223fb20a439cbae4994100f45574675]]> Meeting number: 647 969 869
To receive a call back, provide your phone number when you join the event, or call the number below and enter the access code.
Call-in toll-free number:
1-877-8818371 (US) 080 0032 0677 (UK) 08 00 94 86 56 (France) 08007 242990 (Germany) 08000201642 (Netherlands)
Call-in number:
1-617-3374371 (US) +44 (0) 20 3457 4999 (UK) +33 (0) 157327043 (France) +49 (0) 69380 791131 (Germany)
Attendee access code:
724 961 99
Should you have any questions, please email Madison Schlegel at mschlegel@pivotal.io <[[mailto:mschlegel@pivotal.io]]>.
